item.name: Interpretation
item.hint: What concept/claim can be inferred from a pattern of data? e.g. What type of function looks like it would best fit the given data?

item.name: Causal antecedent
item.hint: Why did an event occur? e.g. Why was the substitution/elimination method chosen?

item.name: Causal consequence
item.hint: What are the consequences of an event or state? e.g. What would the next step be?

item.name: Goal orientation
item.hint: What are the motives or goals behind an agent X action?

item.name: Instrumental/procedural
item.hint: What plan or instrument allows an agent to accomplish a goal? e.g. What is the method you will employ to solve this problem?

item.name: Enablement
item.hint: What object or resource allows an agent to accomplish a goal?

item.name: Expectation
item.hint: Why did some expected event not occur?

item.name: Judgmental
item.hint: What value does the answerer place on an idea or advice?
